entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is the one who picked up a fallen flower from the bush behind which Snape lurked. She waited until Petunia was near enough to have a clear view, then held out her palm and showed the flower to Petunia.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is Lily's sister. She advanced towards Lily, evidently torn between curiosity and disapproval. She shrieked when Snape jumped out from behind the bushes.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who was lurking behind the bushes. He seemed to regret his appearance and had been trying to contain himself.

relationships.description: Lily and Petunia are sisters, as mentioned in the text. This relationship is not explicitly stated but can be inferred from their interaction.
Lily and Snape interacted with each other when Lily showed the flower to Petunia, and Snape jumped out from behind the bushes.
Petunia and Snape interacted with each other when Snape jumped out from behind the bushes, causing Petunia to shriek and run backward.
